carpet.rule.PlayerMiningFatigueFreeGuard: Player Immune to Guardian Mining Fatigue
carpet.rule.SpongeCanAbsorbLava.extra.0: true: Dry sponges absorb lava (turn into wet sponges)
carpet.rule.SpongeCanAbsorbLava.extra.1: wet_sponge: Wet sponges absorb lava (turn into dry sponges)
carpet.rule.SpongeCanAbsorbLava.extra.2: false: Sponges do not absorb lava
